post_title: T206 John McGraw portrait w/ cap Sgc 7
post_content:
FS: T206 John McGraw portrait w/ cap - Sgc 7

There hasn't been an example of this card in Psa/Sgc 7 grade or higher come up for sale since 2021.

There was a Psa 6 which sold for $2,700 in October of 2022 via Goldin. I think this one is nicer though. Just say'in ;) 

Price on Mr. Mcgraw is $3,000 delivered - drop me a PM if interested. Thanks all, 

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/threetwocount/threetwocount/sgc7t206mcgrawwhatfront.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/threetwocount/threetwocount/sgc7t206mcgrawwhatback.jpg[/IMG]
That’s a stunning card, Tony! Trent King
